hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aishah said:"I remember twisting the garlands for the sacrificial sheep of the Messenger of Allah, then he sent them and stayed with us as a non-Muhrim (not in a state of Ihram)

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يُوجِبُ تَقْلِيدُ الْهَدْىِ إِحْرَامًا .
chapter.eng-name: Does Garlanding The Hadi Mean That One is In A state of Ihram?
